import React,{useState}from'react';import Note from'../Note/note';import{NOTES}from'./data';import Modal from'../Modal/modal';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const NotesList=()=>{const[currentNotes,setCurentNotes]=useState(NOTES);const[isModal,setIsModal]=useState(false);const[newTitle,setNewTitle]=useState('');const[newDescription,setNewDescription]=useState('');const deleteNote=id=>{setCurentNotes(currentNotes.filter(note=>note.id!==id));};const addNote=()=>{if(newTitle.trim()&&newDescription.trim()){setCurentNotes([...currentNotes,{id:Math.random(),title:newTitle,description:newDescription}]);setNewTitle('');setNewDescription('');setIsModal(false);}};return/*#__PURE__*/(//
